alert.note: Alert for Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 04 at 12:54PM EST until February 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches for a storm total of 10 to 16 inches, sleet accumulations of one half inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Central Washington, Interior Hancock and Southern Penobscot Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice will make travel extremely dangerous. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Southern Penobscot
